description.narrative: This activity (Security and Justice Programme Design) is a component of Integrated Programme for Strengthening Security and Justice reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £499,998. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Women's equality organisations and institutions, Security system management and reform, Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution, Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Limited, Home Office, International Alert, Oxford Policy Management, Palladium International Ltd (UK), Social Development Direct Limited, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP). The start date is 09-08-2013 and the end date is 31-12-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
